inclusion.criterion: Women 18 years and older currently using COCs or who have a COC prescription
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intending to initiate COCs for contraception
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: contraindications to using a COC or a contraceptive implant (Category 3 or 4 in the CDC Medical Eligibility Criteria [MEC])
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: currently participating in a clinical trial or have participated within the past 30 days
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 19-year-old Hispanic female with no specific past medical issues, using prenatal vitamins. She has a family history of DM type 2 and HTN.
